definitions.definition: To intentionally call attention to the improbable , incongruent , or clichéd nature of an element or situation featured in a work of fiction within the work itself.
To wear an oversize top with skintight thigh-high boots and no leggings.
To adorn with one or more lampshades.

main_definition: ( narratology , fandom slang ) To intentionally call attention to the improbable , incongruent , or clichéd nature of an element or situation featured in a work of fiction within the work itself.
secondary_definitions: ( fashion ) To wear an oversize top with skintight thigh-high boots and no leggings.
To adorn with one or more lampshades.
